topic.title: [Meta] Archived /r/watchpeopledie Christchurch Shooting Thread
topic.body:
https://www.scribd.com/document/402563375/r-Watchpeopledie-Christchurch-Thread?secret_password=125DpUNiLMn72ZNZJvCN

Captured late evening of the shooting, shortly before this thread was removed and one day before the subreddit was banned.

1553120037_17aNdWGt8CUuZmT7Ec6woyQW4Mf6p.body: Good call, thanks. Still new to ZN. Here's a start: /1E28d24HeKvaPAMKKYJXcPSFfsGHGhmt2S/

1552891052_14JMe2K9H9F9DwFi2s6tuwiQT66FY.body: Anybody have a torrent going of this? I'm about to pay for a month of Mega to download it and could start one.
